title: Cardi B Serves Ultimate ‘Masked Singer’ At Paris Fashion Week In Head-To-Toe Ensemble
text:
Cardi B has well-and-truly shut down Paris Fashion Week after walking the Parisian streets in head-to-toe Richard Quinn.

“Washpoppin’ baby,” Cardi posted to the ‘gram, in front of the Eiffel Tower. “I heard you bitches was missing me in fashion week New York. I’m here to serve it to you motherfuckers… and serve it to you cold.”

“You bitches could really never,” she then says, before strutting across the road in front of a sea of onlookers and paparazzi.

“Make sure a car don’t hit me, ’cause a bitch can’t see.” It’s honestly nothing short of iconic.

View this post on Instagram A post shared by Iamcardib (@iamcardib) on Sep 28, 2019 at 12:04pm PDT

This is a look I’d either sport on a Sunday morning when I’m hungover and heading to Woolies in search of a Powerade, or at my sugar daddy’s funeral. I think it’d sum up both moods immaculately.

The floral ensemble, part of Quinn’s A/W19 collection, was featured in July’s British Vogue with Karlie Kloss.

Either way, we simply have no choice but to stan. The Masking Singer is quaking.
description: Cardi B has well and truly shut down Paris Fashion Week after stepping out onto the Parisian streets in head-to-toe Richard Quinn.
